Building a Global WooCommerce Community







Connecting the global community of WooCommerce product and site builders, developers, freelancers and agencies, to share their story and learn from each other.














 



Latest Episode









 












BobWP Talks About WPSpeakers.com on the Friday Show 




			April 28, 2023			

Recently Michelle Freschette launched WPSpeakers.com. A site where you can list yourself as a speaker or find someone of your event.



Listen / transcripts

Do the Woo Joins WordCamp Europe 2023 as Media Partner

When WooCommerce Developers Need to Find an Accessibility Partner
